Actions.Name: Close Request - Incident
Actions.Description: To close an incident or request.

Actions.Name: Create Asset
Actions.Description: This resource allows to create a new Asset.

Actions.Name: Create Asset Link
Actions.Description: This resource allows to create a new Asset Link.

Actions.Name: Create Configuration Item Link
Actions.Description: Creates a new configuration item relationship.

Actions.Name: Create Employee
Actions.Description: This resource allows to create a new Employee.

Actions.Name: Create Request-Incident
Actions.Description: This resource allows to create a new request or incident.

Actions.Name: Create Task
Actions.Description: This resource allows to create a task.

Actions.Name: Delete Asset Link
Actions.Description: This resource allows to delete the specified Asset Link.

Actions.Name: Delete Configuration Item Link
Actions.Description: Removes a configuration item relationship.

Actions.Name: Finish action
Actions.Description: This resource allows to finish the specified action.

Actions.Name: Get Request - Incident Document List
Actions.Description: Returns the URLs of all documents attached to the specified incident or request.

Actions.Name: Restart Request - Incident
Actions.Description: To restart an incident or request, update it with the optional "restarted" object along with a comment.

Actions.Name: Suspend Request - Incident
Actions.Description: To suspend an incident or request, update it with the optional "suspended" object along with a comment.

Actions.Name: Update Asset
Actions.Description: This resource allows to update the specified Asset.

Actions.Name: Update Asset Link
Actions.Description: This resource allows to update the specified Asset Link.

Actions.Name: Update Configuration Item Link
Actions.Description: Updates the configuration item link. Only relation_type and blocking property can be updated.

Actions.Name: Update Employee
Actions.Description: This resource allows to update the specified Employee.

Actions.Name: Update Request - Incident
Actions.Description: This resource allows to update the specified request or incident.

Actions.Name: Upload and attach a Document to a Request - Incident
Actions.Description: Uploads a file (docx, pdf, txt or image file) and attach it to the specified request.

Actions.Name: View Asset
Actions.Description: Returns the specified Asset.

Actions.Name: View Asset Link
Actions.Description: Returns a specific link corresponding to a {parent_asset_id} and a {asset_id}.

Actions.Name: View Asset Links
Actions.Description: Returns all the links for a specific asset.

Actions.Name: View Assets List
Actions.Description: Returns List of assets.

Actions.Name: View Catalog Asset
Actions.Description: Returns an asset catalog entry.

Actions.Name: View Catalog Assets List
Actions.Description: Returns List of catalog assets.

Actions.Name: View Catalog Request
Actions.Description: Returns a catalog requests item.

Actions.Name: View Catalog Request Path
Actions.Description: Returns a catalog requests path item.

Actions.Name: View Catalog Requests List
Actions.Description: Returns List of catalog requests.

Actions.Name: View Catalog Requests Path List
Actions.Description: Returns List of catalog request path.

Actions.Name: View Configuration Item
Actions.Description: Returns the specified Configuration Item.

Actions.Name: View Configuration Item Link
Actions.Description: Returns a specific link corresponding to a {parent_ci_id} and a {child_ci_id}

Actions.Name: View Configuration Item Links
Actions.Description: Returns all the links for a specific configuration item {ci_id}.

Actions.Name: View Configuration Items List
Actions.Description: Returns List of configuration items.

Actions.Name: View Employee
Actions.Description: Returns the specified Employee.

Actions.Name: View Employees List
Actions.Description: Returns List of Employees.

Actions.Name: View Entities List
Actions.Description: Returns List of entities.

Actions.Name: View Entity
Actions.Description: Returns the specified entity.

Actions.Name: View Known Errors
Actions.Description: Returns the specified known Errors.

Actions.Name: View Known Errors List
Actions.Description: Returns List of known errors.

Actions.Name: View Location
Actions.Description: Returns the specified location.

Actions.Name: View Locations List
Actions.Description: Returns List of locations.

Actions.Name: View Manufacturer
Actions.Description: Returns the specified Manufacturer.

Actions.Name: View Manufacturer List
Actions.Description: Returns List of manufacturers.

Actions.Name: View Request - Incident
Actions.Description: Returns the specified incident or request.

Actions.Name: View Request - Incident Comment
Actions.Description: Returns the comment associated to the specified incident or request.

Actions.Name: View Requests - Incidents list
Actions.Description: Returns List of Incidents or Requests.

Actions.Name: View SLA
Actions.Description: Returns the specified SLA.

Actions.Name: View SLAs List
Actions.Description: Returns List of SLAs.
